description: Research team requests identification of early‑phase study participants with pathogenic BRCA1 mutation, age 30‑65, ECOG ≤1, no prior chemotherapy. The assistant parses the eligibility text, queries the EMR, sends secure invitations, records patient consent, and schedules a tele‑health consult.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Use the provided tools to transform free‑text eligibility criteria into structured JSON, query the EMR for matching patients, securely message them, capture their consent, and schedule meetings while keeping an audit trail.

Our early‑phase study on a new PARP inhibitor needs patients with a pathogenic BRCA1 mutation, age between 30 and 65, ECOG performance status ≤1, and no prior chemotherapy. Find eligible patients, send them a brief invitation through the patient portal, record any consent they give, and schedule a tele‑health consult for those who agree.
First I will transform the free‑text eligibility criteria into a structured format that the EMR can understand.

arguments.eligibility_text: Inclusion: Age 30-65 years; pathogenic BRCA1 mutation; ECOG performance status ≤1; no prior chemotherapy. Exclusion: Prior PARP inhibitor exposure; active second malignancy.

messages.content: Using the parsed criteria, I will search the EMR for up to five matching patients.

I found two eligible patients:
- **P00123**, 58‑year‑old female
- **P00456**, 45‑year‑old male
I will now send each a secure portal message inviting them to consider participation and providing a link to the consent form.

arguments.subject: Invitation to Participate in Early‑Phase PARP Inhibitor Study
arguments.body:
### Dear Patient,

You have been identified as a potential candidate for an early‑phase clinical trial evaluating a new PARP inhibitor for individuals with a pathogenic **BRCA1** mutation.

**Key eligibility**: Age 30‑65, ECOG ≤1, no prior chemotherapy.

If you are interested, please review the study details and provide your consent using the link below:

[Study Information & Consent Form](https://clinicaltrials.example.com/consent?patient=P00123)

Feel free to reply to this message with any questions.

*Thank you for considering participation.*
